definitions.definition: One who heckles ; somebody who insults , makes fun of , or teases .
examples: The juggler always seemed to have a heckler or two in the crowd on Saturdays.

definitions.definition: An aircraft flying attack missions at night .
Alternative form of hackler ( “ worker who separates flax ” ) .

main_definition: One who heckles ; somebody who insults , makes fun of , or teases .
secondary_definitions: ( US , military , slang ) An aircraft flying attack missions at night .
Alternative form of hackler ( “ worker who separates flax ” ) .
